name: Dam Tre Bay – 1 Day Trekking Tour
description: Dam Tre Bay has an area of ​​132 hectares, 16km from the town, and located in the North-East of Con Son island. Here is a large bay, sheltered by mangrove forest surrounded and caves for bird nests at the mouth of bay. Then you will know why this bay was named Dam Tre bay (Bamboo bay)
